mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cinema(ccode, cname, cnameEn, cintro, cprdtYear, cshowTime, copenDate, cprdtStatNm, cnationNm, cgenreNm, cdirectorNm, cdirectorNmEn, cactorNm, cactorNmEn, ccompanyNm, ccompanyNmEn, cwatchGradeNm, cposter) VALUES (#{ccode}, #{cname}, #{cnameEn}, #{cintro}, #{cprdtYear}, #{cshowTime}, #{copenDate}, #{cprdtStatNm}, #{cnationNm}, #{cgenreNm}, #{cdirectorNm}, #{cdirectorNmEn}, #{cactorNm}, #{cactorNmEn}, #{ccompanyNm}, #{ccompanyNmEn}, #{cwatchGradeNm}, #{cposter}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cname = #{cname}, cnameEn = #{cnameEn}, cintro = #{cintro}, cprdtYear = #{cprdtYear}, cshowTime = #{cshowTime}, copenDate = #{copenDate}, cprdtStatNm = #{cprdtStatNm}, cnationNm = #{cnationNm}, cgenreNm = #{cgenreNm}, cdirectorNm = #{cdirectorNm}, cdirectorNmEn = #{cdirectorNmEn}, cactorNm = #{cactorNm}, cactorNmEn = #{cactorNmEn}, ccompanyNm = #{ccompanyNm}, ccompanyNmEn = #{ccompanyNmEn}, cwatchGradeNm = #{cwatchGradeNm}, cposter = #{cposter}
